name: Domain of Forgery: Trial Grounds of Thunder I
description:
Massive Electro energy is coursing through this thundering ancient sacrificial altar.
The dispersed Electro elements constantly dispel Energy.
You shall earn Weapon Ascension Materials, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed.
